Bio:
Three badgers from Northern Ireland, Birmingham and Ilkeston who met in Nottingham and decided to make loud experimental math-rock together

We spend our time constantly writing and touring the UK,Ireland and Europe as much as possible, we self-released a couple of EP’s before joining the Field Records family, the “123.EP” was also picked up and released in Japan by Linus records and our debut album "Snib" is released on the 7th feb 2011.

We've received various BBC radio plays and recorded acoustic sessions for BBC introducing as well as featuring in forthcoming independent films by Beat24 and I’m Not from London. we've also played with bands such as Mono, Zu, Holy Fuck, Ungdomskulen, And So I Watch You From Afar, Adebisi Shank, Chrik, Maybeshewill and loads more

We are always looking for shows so please do get in touch...
